Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the presence of a "child militia" during the protests in Atlanta.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the existence of a child militia.
Exist alternative explanation: The video actually shows adult members of the Georgia National Guard, not a child militia.
Understate: The claim understates the fact that the individuals in the video were of eligible age to join the Georgia National Guard.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the individuals in the video are underage without concrete evidence.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video depicts adult members of the Georgia National Guard.
Falters at times: The claim falters by relying on camera angles and distance to create a perception of individuals being too physically small, without considering other factors.
